Have well over 400+ hours and still going strong.  The game really has a lot of replay value, you will always be on your toes and will see something new or interesting each match. You will laugh, cry and scream. This game brings just about every emotion you can expect while also having a conflicting aspect to it. 

I don't play many games for hundreds of hours that don't bore me by then. This game is unique in it's own right and the experience is unique as well. This isn't just a shoot em up, adventurer, or platformer. This is a competitive horror game done right. 

Some of the downsides I can say is that you will experience bugs fairly often. Most of these are nothing game breaking, but the devs tend to take a while to address these issues. If it's game breaking, they will do their best to fix it as soon as possible. Dead By Daylight is a game that feeds on new content as well. This is not necessarily a downside (considering it's replay value) but new content is expected, regularly from the devs. It can take them a while (couple of months) to release new content that will make people keep coming back.

All in all, if you can look past the bugs and lack of timely content, - you WILL enjoy this game. There is a layer of insane, endless fun under the technical issues of this game and once you can see that, bugs and other issues will become almost insignificant. It is just too much fun and too much of a great idea to not recommend this game, regardless of some issues.

不错

Fantastic concept and gameplay, but unfortunately suffers from proper developer prioritization.

While overlooking the obvious "no-no" of having Peer2Peer hosting in an asymmetrical multiplayer game, blatant exploits are ever present on top of bugs that should've been fixed weeks ago when they were discovered. However, hopes are high that the next upcoming patch will resolve many issues, in about 2 days after this review is published.

As for balancing, it should be well known that it is notoriously difficult to balance both sides in an asymmetrical multiplayer game, especially one that integrates killed off teammates as part of gameplay, as well as fresh content being constantly added. In addition, the ranking system makes balance even more difficult. The developers must decide whether to balance the game around the general low ranking population or the high ranking population, where a difference in playstyle is strongly evident.

The grind system is heavily dependent on your tastes. Personally, I particularly enjoy progressing through various levels to upgrade my character with perks and unlock items that can be of great use during gameplay.

Replayability is quite strong, as there can be very many combinations of loadouts, including perks and items, as well as various killers that you might encounter or can play as. There are quite a few maps, each as a set of a particular theme, like a junkyard or an insane asylumn. Random level generation is applied to survivor objectives, item chests, and killer hook locations (Which is where the killer hangs survivors after finding and catching them.)

Overall, I'd say the game is worth your time. Bugs and exploits may annoy you as well as cheap tactics one side may use, but try switching over to the other side if you feel frustrated. Being able to swap roles is personally my favorite aspect of the game, whether to outsmart the killer, or to slaughter an entire group of survivors.

The game is a bit wobbley but executes it's mechanics very well. the game is tense and stressful and gives you a good rush as you're running from a killer. However it's a bit unbalanced. it has serious issues when it comes to Killer balancing. though the devs are pretty ambitious when it comes to new tricks for killers which i can applaud. 

as a survivor your issues come from getting caught. base line. you'll complain about the killers being unbalanced but in reality it's a massive game of hide and seek. if you get caught you lose. so once you learn how to properly hide from, and evade the killer. you're golden.

TL:DR: Has it's flaws but is fun overall once you grasp it

I will always like Dead by Daylight. People blame this game on being unfair or unbalanced based on their own lack of skill. Starting off, everyone will struggle to learn the strategies required to win games. Once you understand then however, you will have a blast trying to escape or kill. The best part is that every game is different. For the most part, it is always balanced and updates come fairly frequently.

The only downside is the community. Some people are great, but others spend 24 hours a day in discussions yelling at everyone who dares to think about this game in a positive way.

Note: If you read negative reviews talking about this game being unfair for killers, then those people are liars. It is very easy to win as killers, but the toxic members of the community like to leave negative reviews because the devs have backbones and do not give them everything that they want. As an experienced killer, I kill everyone in almost every game I play, no matter if the survivors are friends or not. The game is worth it, but you need to be able to withstand the pressure from hateful people through comments.

Да, все, что написано ниже - чистейший воды правда. Но спустя уже 3 года игры в эту игру (тавтология мое все) я хочу сказать лишь одно. Мне становится в ней дико скучно. Очень. Очень. Очень скучно. Да, я мейнсурв и вижу все только с одной стороны. Но знаете что? Мне уже все равно. На манах я не хочу катать, на сурвах в соло по-прежнему невозможно катать. Только друзья и только они спасают зис гейминг. И мой вам совет, если вы такой же мейнсурв как и я, - никогда не катайте на 1 рангах. Вам станет невыносимо скучно из-за одной и той же тактики манов. И да, сурвы из-за этого тоже действуют по такой же одинаковой контртактике. И это обидно. Игра правда хорошая, но коммьюнити уже сидит в печенках. Причем с любой стороны - все одинаковые. Скучно.

//

Я люблю эту игру не смотря ни на что. Dead by Daylight стала для меня сокровенным местом, где я могу повеселиться с друзьями.
Поэтому, конечно, я ее рекомендую.

Плюсы:

а) Игра с друзьями, конечно же
б) Игра за обе стороны баррикад (маньяк и выживший, никаких ботов, только реальные люди и их логика)
в) Сам геймплей (пусть и однообразен, но может затянуть, ведь каждая катка может оказаться по своему интересной)

Минусы:

а) баги, естественно, и без них никак.
б) желчное коммьюнити - да-да, именно так, не надейтесь, что вас тут встретят с горячей чашечкой чая и пряниками, учитесь терпеть оскорбления и прочие прелести людской натуры.
в) туннелинг, фейскемп, кемперство - это три кита, без которых маны жить не могут на этом белом свете. Причем чем ближе к 1 рангу, тем чаще такое встречается.

Лагерь моих друзей делится на 2 категории: считающие, что маны слабые и что маны сильные.

Я не считаю манов ни сильными, ни слабыми. Сама я мейнсурв и могу судить лишь по играм своих друзей (ибо за мана мне лично играть скучно). Я скажу так, если ман не 20ка (причем речь не о ранге, а в умении играть в эту игру), то он унесет с собой хотя бы двух сурвов. Но у нас же 99% коммьюнити играет одинаково на манах, поэтому и подход ко всем почти один и тот же (почти из-за разных способностей самих манов, а не людей, катающих на них), то и сильные сурвы рвут в клочья таких мэниаков. А маны все понять не могут, что пора бы уже сменить свою тактику игры. Учитывая, что манов бафают постоянно, а сурвов урезают. Но сурвы почему-то все равно рвут в клочья. Интересно почему?)

Лично знаю маньяка, который мог разложить сильных игроков на раз-два и сделать минус 4, заметьте, без ЛЮБОЙ уязвимости (ноед и прочие штучки), без аддонов, без кемперства, туннелинга и фейскемпа. Все дело в умении играть, а не пытаться затоксичить (какое модное слово) сурвов.

И да, не скажу, что сурвы тоже лапушки в этом плане. Когда я играла на манах (да, я пыталась осилить эту скуку, все-таки на манах получаешь больше очков, чем на сурвах при правильной игре), передо мной тоже приседали, щелкали фонариком - все равно было. Учитывая, что потом такие недотоксики умирали обычно первыми (или ливали). 

Я могла бы еще вечность рассказывать об этой прекрасной игре, но это может продлится на... 2000 часов :)

В общем, концепция игры хорошая (чем она и зацепила меня), не скажу, что реализация плохая, но дорабатывать игру стоит, причем много и основательно.

ÇOK EĞLENDİM, AMA EĞLENMEKTEN DAHA ÇOK SİNİRLENDİM.Nedeni aşağıda.
***Olumsuz Eleştiri:
1) Katiller çok ayrıcalıklı, bu konu gerçekten can sıkıcı. Katil kovaladığı kişiyi hipotenüs çizerek zaten yakalayabiliyor. Bir de üstüne üstlük extra hız vermek onları çok güçlü yapıyor.
2) Survivor geliştirmeleri katillere kıyasla beş para etmez.(katilin özellikleri öldürmeye yönelikken, survivor'un özellikleri kaçmaya yönelikten ziyade saklanmaya yönelik. )
3) 'Camper' lik (kampçı : Astığı kişinin başında kamp kuran) yapan çok oyuncu var. Bu camper'liğe yapımcılar tarafından bir çare bulunmalı.
4) Oyuna yeni başlamış bir katil, 50 level 1 Ranklı(Yani deneyimi oyncu) bir survivor'ı rahatlıkla öldürebiliyor. Survivor'un geliştirilmesi lazım.
örneğin: o kadar geliştirme yapıyoruz tamir ve sabotaj hızı %5-10 artıyor. vb. gereksiz perkler var. oysaki %25-75 arası olsa gayet güzel olur. Oyun çok hızlı biten diyenlere cevabım: katil 3-5dk'da herkesi yere serebiliyorken bence survivor'ın hızlı olması gerek.
5) Camper' lik olayı oyuna çekilmez bir hale getiriyor. Bu oyuncuların oyun bilinciyle alakalı. Bazen katillerin adresini alıp, camperliği gerçek hayatta onlara tattırasım geliyor :D
6) Haritalar birbirine çok benziyor.

***Olumlu Eleştiri:
1) Çok eğlenceli
2) Çok korkutucu ve adrenalin dolu. o kadar ki bazen kalp çarpımtısı oluyor bende :D
3) Arkadaşlar arası mükemmel keyif alacağınız bir oyun.
4) Atmosfer mükemmel, grafikler de öyle.
5) Karakter çeşitliliği de fena değil. Artırılsa daha iyi olur.
6) Nesne eklentileri çok çeşitli, süper bir içerik.

Daha aklıma gelmeyen eleştiri olabilir. Oyuna olan olumlu bakışım:%49 olumsuz bakışım:%51 yukarıdaki olumsuz eleştiriler ışığında bu oyunu şimdilik tavsiye etmiyorum.

当初买这款游戏就是看中了被屠夫追杀的害怕、紧张、刺激，现在作为一个日常溜屠夫的老司机，很怀念当初的感觉。
很推荐和小伙伴一起玩这款游戏；你们可以一起被追杀，然后一起上树23333。
游戏确实堪称大作，人与屠夫利用地形、物品、技能斗智斗勇其乐无穷。
前一阵各种开挂、改档、卡BUG现象严重，现在在制作方的严打下好多了；反正我是没遇到过BUG。
不过这游戏对新手比较不友好，萌新比较难上手。游戏性确实挺好，喜欢这种类型的可以入手了。

scary but fun

So where do I begin..

Firstly, good luck trying to play with friends because that just ISNT going to happen. Survive with friends mode is ALWAYS broken, making it so that you will all need to simultaneously queue up in "Join A Lobby" and HOPE and PRAY that all of you join the same team.. this can take upwards to about 5 hours.. (not joking, I seriously wish I was)

Once in a lobby you can not see the profile of other players, therefore you have NO idea what anyone's rank or level is. This would be fine if the match making system was fair and even. a Survivor rank 20 person should NOT be queuing up with a rank 13 killer (Prestige 3) that has 3 level 3 perks...??? seems legit..

Next prepare to wait at yet another loading screen after waiting soo long to get into a lobby :) loading is ALWAYS FUN!

When you get in a game there is a VERY GOOD chance that the killer (the host of the server and game BTW) might disconnect from the game. When this happens the survivors escape YAY!!! BUT HOLD ONN NOW!! not before losing any items, or offerings you loaded onto your character beforehand in lobby.. GROOOOOVY!

BUT I think MY MOST FAVORITE PART OF THIS GAME are selfish survivors, survivors who are friends (and only help each other) and the camping KILLERS! :) Now, when I say camping I mean legit camping, just stands there and looks at the survivor on the hook and waits for someone to come and try to save them. I get the whole "well, if that's the case just focus on generators and forget that player" but that SUCKS and how would you feel it were you? you would want your team to leave you behind or not try to help?? (didn't think so). There should honestly be a radius or something that a killer cant go into while a suvivor is hooked or something, I don't know.

This game needs A LOT of work..

All in all going to uninstall and wouldnt recommend this to ANYONE. I am going to wait for Friday the 13th and Last Year. If this studio was smart, they would try to perfect their craft BEFORE those games hit the market but their lack of support and patching shows they dont care.. I mean HONESTLY how do you release so many DLC for a game that isn't completely finished? Money hungry much?!

ggs

Wouldn't recommend.. wait for other games in the same catergory

[h1] First proper asymetric game [/h1]
This game is quite unique since there is no competion up the recently released Friday the 13th and the ages ago deceased Evolve. It all rounds up upon the idea of game where one stands against a few but with a twist - the one guy is a predator, stalker, maimer - the killer, spawn of entity? Slave of entity? Loving bystander? What is entity? Who knows. Developers are giving a small clues now and then but the story backgrounds are still mostly mysterious. Basically survivors struggle to repair generators so they can open exit gates and leave the trial unharmed as a killer is trying to sacrifice them to the said entity. I might say I really do enjoy the game far more than I did when the game came out.
For that and more I decided to completely re-done the review since the game changed a lot.

++ Originality of the game idea
+ Graphic
+ Artwork
+ General gameplay
+ Good range of maps to play on
+ Nice character pool to choose from
+ Plentiful player base
+ Devs and community managers are responsive to community. Twitch streams on regular basis.
+ Reasonable DLC and FLC policy
- Some members of community - camping, looping, griefing and other misconducts are not that rare as they should be
- Abusable game mechanics - connected with previous point
- Occasional bugs and glitches still happens

8/10 [i]"We have to work as a team, I need you to survive so that I can survive!" -Dwight"[/i]
